# **Psyc 73800**

### *Cognitive Psychology* {style="padding-top: 0px;"}

This is the course website for Psyc 73800: Cognitive Psychology (Fall 2018), offered through the Cognition and Comparative Psychology (CCP) training area, Department of Psychology, Graduate Center of CUNY.

Course Coordinator: Matthew Crump [mcrump@brooklyn.cuny.edu](mcrump@brooklyn.cuny.edu)

This course is co-taught by several faculty from CCP, who will each lead a 2-week module on various topics in Cognitive Psychology.

1. Matthew Crump: Foundations
2. Andrew Delamater: Learning
3. Virginia Valian: Language
4. Sandeep Prasada: Concepts
5. Timothy Ricker: Attention/Memory
6. Frank Grasso: Comparative Cognition
